subject: Soccer
Politics and Government
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Britain’s soccer team at the Olympics may be composed largely, or even entirely, of English players, as Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland have refused to sanction the idea of a national team.
snippet: Britain’s soccer team at the Olympics may be composed largely, or even entirely, of English players, as Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland have refused to sanction the idea of a national team.
